doc.field: American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
Series V: Publications and Publicity Files
Series V: Publications and Publicity Files

Files contain research notes for and drafts of articles, presumably for publication in DC 1707 Voice or Council newsletters. Subjects include DC 1707's agencies, politics, issues of interest to Council members, and profiles of members. Also included are drafts of columns written by DC 1707 and AFSCME officers. Also included in this series are 199 floppy disks, which appear to contain articles, drafts, photos and graphics for DC 1707 publications.
